title: How one can learn moral values with educational values? - Quora

response.answer_text: A GOOD QUESTION INDEED! And the said 'knowledge' refered in 'Education' means 'information', based 'only on TRUTH OR REALITY OR AS PER 'THE REAL LOGIC. Now, the simple answer to the question, as I think, is contained in the above few lines. That is to say that, ‘EDUCATION' IS BASED ON 'TRUE VALUES, i.e. TRUTH itself. Irrespective of any 'branch', 'part', ‘ mode ' or 'method' of EDUCATION; irrespective of the 'various' 'benifits ‘, obtained from the 'learning the various ‘subjects’ of EDUCATION, ‘THE FIRST AND THE FOREMOST MESSAGE , or, LESSON, FROM ANY TYPE OF 'EDUCATION', IS THAT- WORLD WILL FLOURISH ONLY ON THE LINES OF 'TRUTHFULNESS AND INTELLECTUAL HONEST'.
